verses.name: Micah 4:12
verses.text: But they know not the thoughts of the Lord, neither understand they his counsel: for he shall gather them as the sheaves into the floor.

verses.name: Micah 4:13
verses.text: Arise and thresh, O daughter of Zion: for I will make thine horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass: and thou shalt beat in pieces many people: and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.
